sec.title: Practical example of internal and external communication
sec.p: Clause 6.4.4. of UNI/PdR 125:2022 Guidelines on the management system for gender equality which provides the adoption of specific KPIs (Key Performance Indicator) relating to gender equality policies in organizations provides an example of internal and external communication: [â€¦]

list-item.p: prepare and disseminate to its interested parties (stakeholders) a communication plan relating to its commitment on gender equality issues (or more generally on DEI issues);

base their internal and external communication (marketing, advertising) on responsibility (avoiding the gender stereotype in advertising actions, ensuring a periodic review of marketing materials and strategies, committing to spread a positive image of women and girls, using a language respectful of gender differences);
identify the interested parties with whom to establish communication regarding gender equality issues, especially in the workplace;
ensure that communication is consistent with the principles of the policy and with the objectives established and implemented by means of the strategic plan;
align internal and external communication with corporate values and culture.
